rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0001
rows.name:
It's just as I thought...
We're not going to get much
further without outside help...

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Invidia prospers from its Gromrice
production, as I'm sure you know.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0003
rows.name:
That's why we're ploughing on with
our Gromrice research, night and day.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0004
rows.name:
But recently we've been making poor
progress and have ground to a halt.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0005
rows.name:
That's why we're on the lookout for
some plant experts. Driver, Blade,
Nopon, it doesn't matter.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0006
rows.name:
If you find anyone suitable, could you
send them our way?
